description:
I interview and audition a lot of guys to find the models for this site. Every once in a while I like to share some of my audition tapes. Enjoy!
Bisexual. Hot 32 year old from the early days. Very shy and goes to great effort to keep from looking at the camera. Hard right out of his pants, he oils himself up and then pops his load on the bed. Even though he doesn't say much, he really seems to enjoy himself.
Gay. Cute-as-a-button Asian dude with nice muscles and an adorable smile.
title: Auditions 9
